description: System-generated unique identifier for this warranty record.
Date-time the warranty row was created or last modified; stored as a high-precision numeric string (likely yyyymmddHHMMSSmmm); confirm with SME.
Human-readable summary of the coverage and terms for this warranty.
Short code identifying the warranty type or program category used across systems.
XML document defining coverage rules, eligibility, and timing (e.g., durations, mileage, components) for this warranty.
Identifier from the source legacy system for lineage/tracing back to the original warranty record.
Name of the source table in the legacy system from which this warranty was migrated; confirm exact usage with SME.
Boolean flag marking the warranty as inactive; when set, the record should not be used operationally.
